original_title: Dragon Gate King of Gate 2014 Day 1
overview: Day 1 of Dragon Gate's 2014 King of Gate tournament is scheduled to take place on May 9, 2014, in Utsunomiya, Tochigi, at the Korakuen Hall, and will air on internet Pay-Per-View. The event will feature eight matches (including one dark match), four of which will be tournament matches.
title: Dragon Gate King of Gate 2014 Day 1
